game.name: DCS: F/A-18C The Rampagers Campaign by Baltic Dragon
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, 추적되는 컨트롤러 지원, 캡션 이용 가능, VR 지원, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 레벨 에디터 포함
game.shortDescription: The Rampagers campaign was developed by Baltic Dragon and Whipbird Production. Follow the F/A-18C squadron - VFA-83 The Rampagers - aboard the USS Harry S Truman as their tour is extended by a month to reinforce Operation Inherent Resolve in Syria from the Eastern Mediterranean Sea.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Rampagers campaign was developed by Baltic Dragon and Whipbird Production. Follow the F/A-18C squadron - VFA-83 The Rampagers - aboard the USS Harry S Truman as their tour is extended by a month to reinforce Operation Inherent Resolve in Syria from the Eastern Mediterranean Sea.
